Classic Hello World! Python SDK.desc:
Python SDK template.
	Get started with a classic Hello World! example.
	This example executes foo(), bar(), and baz() in an await chain pattern.
	Each function appends to the greeting.
	This example does NOT require the use of a Resonate Server.

minimal-resonate-script-py.desc:
Python SDK template.
	This template starts you off with just a single function that is invoked locally.
	This template doesn't require a Resonate Server
	Promises are stored in local memory.

local-run-workflow-py.desc:
Python SDK template.
	This template starts you off with a local two step workflow.
	Each step is defined and invoked locally.
	This template doesn't require a Resonate Server.
	Promises are stored in local memory

remote-rpc-workflow-py.desc:
Python SDK template.
	This template starts you off with a remote two step workflow.
	Each step is defined and invoked remotely.
	This template requires a running Resonate Server to work.
	Promises are stored, and messages are sourced remotely
